channel.title: BUscience
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUscience, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: America is throwing away the minerals that could power its future

item.title: Scientists stunned by salt giants forming beneath the Dead Sea

item.title: Tiny protein pairs may hold the secret to life’s origin

item.title: Doctors warn of a stealth opioid 20x more potent than fentanyl
item.description: Nitazenes, a powerful and largely hidden class of synthetic opioids, are quickly becoming a deadly factor in the overdose crisis. Over 20 times strong...
